name: MyContextualAds
tag_list: contextual, contextual-ads, marketing, online-sellers, online-merchants, google-adsense, cost-per-action, cpa, make-money-online, earning-money-online, bloggers-make-money, advertising
overview:
MyContextualAds.com enables website owners or bloggers to fully monetize their sites by serving contextual product ads from the Amazon.com marketplace. Site Owners make money from referral fees paid out when site visitors click on the ads and transact.

The ads are generated using semantic technologies based contextual analysis algorithms which provides higher contextual relevancy. This ensures higher click through rates and thus higher chances of a sale transaction.

MyContextualAds.com has more ways by which Site Owners can make more money - easier & faster

â€” Blowout Introductory Offer: During their first three months with MyContextualAds.com, Site Owners will earn an amazing 100% of all the revenues generated by their site visitors who click on the ads and then complete a transaction on Amazon.com.

â€” “All Gain & No Pain” Referral Program: MyContextualAds.com maximizes Site Ownerâ€™s earnings with their quick & easy “All Gain & No Pain” Referral Program. They earn a 15% referral fee based on the commissions earned by the publishers they refer.
